U

update() - Method in class shadowGame.Bullet
This is the update method, it is the backbone of all the classes in this game Modelled after the natural sprite update loop in pygame, it updates the animation, and collision checking of the bullet
update() - Method in class shadowGame.Character
This is the method in which where everything happens, this allows for all the animations to occur once called
update() - Method in class shadowGame.Enemy
 
update() - Method in class shadowGame.Level
This is an update loop, this causes the level to scroll and draws the images onto the screen
update() - Method in class shadowGame.PowerUp
An update loop
update() - Method in class shadowGame.TimedEvent
This is an update method, it is meant to constantly update the timer, once called it will add plus one to the index and if the index has reached the maximum it will return it to zero
update(int) - Method in class shadowGame.HealthBar
Drawing an updated healthbard
